授業目的: The purpose of this course is to learn scientific literacy to seek training in a biology-based discipline.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the importance of a system-driven, multidisciplinary approaches in bioscience.
授業方法: Lecture will be in English. For the moment, face to face class is considered. However, depending on the situation of COVID-19, lectures may be on line. Please refer to information on LUNA.

トピック.授業計画1: Several contemporary bioscience-related issues will be discussed by faculty members from different disciplines in order to highlight cross-disciplinary perspectives on fundamental problems and potential solutions in bioscience. The issues include neurophysiology-related topics, aging, infectious diseases, cancer, stem cell biology, advances in genome-based medicine, bioinformatics, environmental biology, microbiology, interfaces between organic chemistry and biology, advances in engineered biomedical systems and so on. Lectures will be presented in English at the regularly scheduled class time.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Understanding of key contents of the lecture
